summary: This document is an email chain from March 6, 2019, discussing a draft status memo. It includes a brief excerpt from an FBI 302 report describing an alleged incident where Jeffrey Epstein asked a female to touch his penis and guided her hand toward it. The emails are between colleagues editing the memo.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in an excerpt from an FBI 302 report describing an alleged incident where he asked a female to touch his penis and guided her hand toward it.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Incident
events.description: During a visit, Jeffrey Epstein asked a female to touch his penis. When she began to reach down, he used his hand to direct her hand toward his penis.

keyFacts: The document contains a direct excerpt from an FBI 302 report describing an alleged sexual incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.
The incident describes Epstein asking a female to touch his penis and then physically guiding her hand toward it.
The email chain is dated March 6, 2019, and concerns the drafting of a status memo, indicating ongoing legal or investigative work related to Epstein.
The correspondence shows internal discussion about the length and content of a legal status memo.
